name: baseframe-css
description: BaseFrame â€” A lightweight modular CSS utility framework.
author: Ali Hassan

scripts.build: sass --no-source-map scss/_index.scss:css/layout.css --style=expanded && cat ./css/framework/*.css ./css/modules/*.css > baseframe.css && stylelint baseframe.css --allow-empty-input || true
scripts.prod: sass --no-source-map scss/_index.scss:css/layout.css --style=compressed && cat ./css/framework/*.css ./css/modules/*.css > baseframe.css && postcss baseframe.css -o baseframe.min.css --env production --no-map
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
